## HytopiaUI.registerSceneUITemplate() method

Registers a custom Scene UI template that can be instantiated by the server using `world.createSceneUI()`<!-- -->. Templates define how your UI should render for each Scene UI instance created by the server.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerSceneUITemplate(templateId: string, templateRenderer: TemplateRenderer): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

templateId


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Unique identifier for this template (must match the templateId used server-side)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

templateRenderer


</td><td>

[TemplateRenderer](./debug-client-threejs.templaterenderer.md)


</td><td>

Function that creates and returns the HTML element for this UI


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
